stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Using the poster, which was produced by the federal government in 1943, answer (a), (b), and (c).

(a) Briefly describe the purpose of the poster.

(b) Briefly explain how the poster was a response to ONE specific characteristic of United States society between 1900 and 1943.

(c) Briefly explain ONE specific way in which the message presented in the poster affected United States society in the period from 1943 to 1960.
